text: Ramesh Ganpatrao Bundile is a member of the 13th Maharashtra Legislative Assembly. He represents the Daryapur Assembly Constituency. He belongs to the Bharatiya Janata Party. He is a retired Chief engineer of MSEDCL. He retired in December 2012. ==References== Category:Maharashtra MLAs 2014–2019 Category:1952 births Category:People from Amravati district Category:Living people Category:Marathi politicians Category:Bharatiya Janata Party politicians from Maharashtra
title: Ramesh Ganpatrao Bundile
